short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ACCELQ Smart Capture plugin analyzes the DOM structure of a webpage to facilitate automated interaction with web apps from ACCELQ.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ACCELQ Smart Capture plugin analyzes the DOM structure of a webpage to facilitate automated interaction with web apps.

Works in conjunction with ACCELQ  test automation product available for subscription.
